---
title: "People"
type: html
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
people <- read_csv("media/People.csv")

```

```{r}
#| output: asis
#| echo: false

people$ImgPath <- paste0("media/people/", gsub(" ", "", people$Name), ".png")

cbo <- "{"
cbc <- "}"
for (i in seq(nrow(people))) {
  cat(with(people[i, ], {
    str_glue(
":::{'person'}
![]({ImgPath}){cbo}width=150{cbc}

### {Name}
{Role} | {University} | {Group}
:::


")
  }))
}
```
